topics.body:
"@DiegoB":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5497b1676368721363d80300#post_5497b1676368721363d80300
It's primarily a series of games, mostly vertical shooters and a few fighting games. It has no official anime. But thanks to it's gargantuan fandom, there are boundless supply of fan animations floating on the net, mostly on NicoVideo. Touhou is in Japan, what MLP FiM is like for us.

"Check em out!":http://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Touhou_Wiki
